overview:
Frank James Falotico is one of the three co-founders of 20DC.com and Creative Content Director for 20DC, L.L.C. He joined the company when his college roommates began working on the project, adding a new entertainment element to concept.

Falotico, 21, has created several shorts featured on the Web site and on the 20DCFilms You Tube page. He most recently served as creator and director of the company’s first online sitcom, “In Production.”

A recent graduate of Point Park University in Pittsburgh, Pa., Falotico has completed his Bachelor of Arts degree in cinema and digital arts. The program was one of the first in the country to teach a regiment of digital filmmaking, which Falotico has segued into creating Internet productions.

Falotico is a native of Ellwood City, Pa, a fringe suburb of Pittsburgh where he currently resides. During his time at Point Park, he completed over 20 short films in addition to the video work created for 20DC.com.

When not behind the lens, Falotico also enjoys playing video games (a rare activity nowadays), watching films and stage acting.

“When I heard the concept for this site, I knew I immediately had to be a part of it,” he said. “This is exactly what our nation needs at this time - a great communication tool to interest and connect the youth of America with their political system, and a way for everyone in the United States to share ideas with each other.”
